name: Himari Invaders
description:
This is a Space Invaders clone involving my OC Himari and DDLC characters

Left and Right Keys move Himari and Space shoot

maded using Godot Engine 3.5

Source Code:

GitHub

DDLC Quote:

S: The way you glow through my blinds in the morning. It makes me feel like you missed me.

Y: Welcome to the Literature Club. It's a pleasure meeting you.

N: I'm not cute!!

M: I'm in love with you.

Characters from Doki Doki Literature Club! (Sayori, Yuri, Natsuki and Monika) belongs to Team Salvato
